00016 // Initialise All stuff needed by the ServiceControl Layer
00017
00018 // Objects to prevent multiple access
00019 static Mutex OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex;
00020
00021 static unsigned int OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount = 0;
00022
00023 // Function to do mandatory init/reset operations
00024
00025 // Init Xml parser
00026 static void InitXmlParser()
00027 {
00028     // Just call the xmlInitParser
00029     //xmlInitParser();
00030     LIBXML_TEST_VERSION
00031 }
00032
00033 static void FreeXmlParser()
00034 {
00035     // Call the free function of libxml
00036     xmlCleanupParser();
00037 }
00038
00039 // Init for DnsSdProxy
00040 static void DnsSdProxyLaunch(bool Init)
00041 {
00042     static DnsSdProxy * MainProxyInstance = (DnsSdProxy *)NULL;
00043
00044     if ( Init == true )
00045     {
00046         MainProxyInstance = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdProxy;
00047     }
00048     else
00049     {
00050         if ( MainProxyInstance != (DnsSdProxy *)NULL )
00051         {
00052             delete MainProxyInstance;
00053             MainProxyInstance = (DnsSdProxy *)NULL;
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057
00058 OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass::OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass()
00059     : OmiscidComLayerInitClass()
00060 {
00061     // Enter locker
00062     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Lock(); // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00063
00064     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount++;
00065     if ( OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount == 1 )
00066     {
00067         // First instance, do init for Layer System
00068
00069         // now init this layer
00070         OmiscidTrace( "Init ServiceControl layer\n" );
00071
00072         // Init XmlParser
00073         InitXmlParser();
00074
00075         // Init Service Control global variables
00076         CommonServiceValues CommonServiceValuesInitObject;
00077         CommonServiceValuesInitObject.InitFromLayer();
00078
00079         // Init DnsSdProx
00080         DnsSdProxyLaunch(true);
00081     }
00082
00083     // Leave locker
00084     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Unlock();       // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00085 }
00086
00087 OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass::~OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass()
00088 {
00089     // Enter locker
00090     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Lock(); // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00091
00092     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount--;
00093     if ( OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitInstanceCount == 0 )
00094     {
00095         // Last instance, do reset for Layer System
00096
00097         // Free DnsSdProx
00098         DnsSdProxyLaunch(false);
00099
00100         // Free XmlParser
00101         FreeXmlParser();
00102
00103         // now init this layer
00104         OmiscidTrace( "Free ServiceControl layer\n" );
00105     }
00106
00107     // Leave locker
00108     OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitMutex.Unlock();       // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00109 }
